name: Machitsuku - Build a Town City
description:
You can play for free basic.

Five items will be granted only on first time startup.
It is an application that makes your own city.

Also supports model change (terminal change).

In that case please remember UserID and Password yourself.

Please set nationality and nickname arbitrarily.

You can acquire the current position and acquire a famous building in the neighborhood (The same building is once in a day, there may be no building nearby.)

You can turn the gacha and get the building. It is granted free once at user registration.

Also, once the gacha count is 0 and the date is updated it will be granted free once.

Pressing How To Button jumps to the page of how to use the application. If you read the page to the end and return to the application, Gacha count will increase by 5.

There is also a population ranking of users.

There is an item catalog that we have acquired so far.
Map is granted free of charge at the time of user registration, but if you use more than 80% of the map, it will be +1 cards.

Map and gacha can also be increased by billing.

Various parameters (population, security, environment, money) are updated once a day.
